articles.title: Former ESPN NFL reporter and handicapping expert Hank Goldberg dies at 82
articles.description: Hank Goldberg, who worked at ESPN as an NFL reporter and handicapping expert for 17 years, died Monday on his 82nd birthday, his family confirmed.
articles.content:

articles.description: Nationals star Juan Soto says he has avoided a major injury to his left calf but may be sidelined for a few more days.
